Summary: looked like a cop carwith lights on in sky
divs: Sighting DetailsMy buudy from next door was walking home from corner store and as a flash and there e objects split from one in sky. He showed his wife and then got me and my wife to see it. It was flashing similar to a cop car in the sky. T was really high up and very slow moving. We observed it for over an hour and it was done close to two hours later. My bro five months led away saw it along with my friend about eight miles the other way as well. It was amazing and kinda weird how we felt. I have see one last year but this one was much higher and slower.it went over the horizon
